feed.title: Current Watches, Warnings and Advisories for New Zealand issued by MetService

entry.title: Strong Wind Warning - Orange
entry.summary: Severe gale southwesterlies gusting 120 km/h in exposed places. Impact: Damage to trees, powerlines, and unsecured structures possible. Driving may be difficult, especially for high-sided vehicles and motorcycles. Chance of upgrading to a Red Warning: Low.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate. Changes: Watch extended southwards to cover all of Waikato.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.summary: Westerly winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Strong Wind Watch
entry.summary: West to southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

entry.summary: Southwest winds may approach severe gale in exposed places. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Snow affecting higher parts of the road should clear overnight Sunday into Monday. 1 to 2 cm may accumulate on the road above 900 metres Sunday night.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Periods of snow are expected to affect higher parts of the road until Monday afternoon. Snow level 600 metres, rising to 800 metres Monday morning. A further 5 to 10 cm of snow may accumulate on the road above 800 metres, with lesser amounts down to 600 metres.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Road Snowfall Warning
entry.summary: Brief snow is possible above 700 metres Sunday night, and up to 1 cm may accumulate. Another brief period of snow is possible late Monday morning, and up to 1 cm may settle on the road.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited
